name: Monkey Madness (Daniel Meyer)
description:
Use your banana cannon to push the other monkeys off the arena, before they push you off!
Watch out for the banana peels your banana bullets leave behind, though...

Try to beat my highscore of 41 ;)

(submitted as an entry to a 4-hour game jam with the theme "Slippery")

- CONTROLS -

WASD: Move
Right Mouse Button: Hold for a bit, then release to launch a banana

- ASSETS USED -

Monkey sprites: Super Monkey Ball
Background: https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/jbdd6o/oc_jungle_background_my_third_...
Music: Diddy Kong Racing Title Theme
Sound effects:  http://www.freesound.org/ (various)
Font: https://www.dafont.com/pingwing.font
